sub_title: Senior Project Manager / Senior Business Developer / Phd in Design Engineering / MSc. Mechanical Automation
summary:
I am a senior project manager with experience in R&D, New Product Development and Business Development.

I have over 20 years of experience assuming roles such as entrepreneur, business developer, researcher, project manager, consultant and project leader.

As an entrepreneur, I funded Digito Medical, a company developing remote patient monitoring solutions for healthcare organizations. 

As a researcher, I have published over 70 articles in peer reviewed journals and international conferences. I led a small research unit at the University of Twente, working on applied engineering projects with industrial partners, tutoring PhD and master students. 

As a consultant, I have helped several companies in their lean and digital transformation processes. 

As an engineer, I have developed robotics solutions to industrial challenges. 

As project leader, I have led the creation of new business units (European Projects department at Mobile World Capital, Smart Industry Network at Symbol vb).


As a philanthropist, I have confounded a business incubator for immigrants in the Netherlands and a business incubator for grassroots innovators in rural Colombia. 

I have had  the opportunity to work in The Netherlands (around 13 years), Venezuela (around 3 years), Spain (6 years), Italy (6 months), Peru (3 months) and Vietnam (3 months).

projects.title: Implementation of a new knowledge management paradigm in Industrial Product Development Cycles
projects.description: Master Thesis Project. This project researches the applicability of a new knowledge management paradigm for dealing with the following issues: how to store new knowledge, how to reuse knowledge, how to handle large models efficiently, which models to use during the design of a given product, how to efficiently and effectively build models during product design.

projects.title: Product Co-Creation Centre (PC3)
projects.description:
Product Co-Creation Centers, or PC3s, are specialized support centers where individuals from the Base of the Pyramid (BoP) co-create innovative products and business models with the aim of becoming (social) entrepreneurs. The projects developed a specialized program where potential (social) entrepreneurs with no required technical or business expertise interact with a panel of experts to co-create products from an initial idea down to a physical prototype with a business plan. This co-creation process results in the professionalization of entrepreneurs and the creation of new product and services ideas with market potential.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=DHikvLzJEZI

projects.title: Knowledge structuring and simulation modeling for product development
projects.description: Master Thesis Project. A new approach for building simulation models was developed. The target are products to be redesigned integrating new technologies. The main idea of the approach is to limit the development of an analysis model to that of the new technology and merge it into the existing prototype using the connection parameters determined at the hand of knowledge models. The approach was implemented at the design of a new generation system iron at PHILIPS.

projects.description: Bachelor graduation assignment, focused on the development of a sustainability strategy for Attema B.V. The assignment has been graded with 8 out of 10.

profile_positions.description:
Huygens Engineers delivers useful technical innovations, calculations and realizations.
Huygens Engineers addresses technical projects where moving parts or moving fluids play a role, and develops engineering solutions in a highly productive mix of:

• ​Fundamental analysis
• Technology selection
• Architecture generation
• Practical engineering
• Design to cost
• Interest in actual realization
• Building and production support

I support Huygens Engineers in developing and implementing their growth strategy as well as managing R&D projects.
profile_positions.title: Senior Project Manager

profile_positions.description: Better Care y Digito Medical se han integrado en una sola compañía: Better Care. En esta nueva etapa, me desempeño como director de ventas, con el objetivo de gestionar las oportunidades a través de nuestros partners, al igual que aquellas que llevamos en directo.
profile_positions.title: Sales/ Business Development Director

profile_positions.description: Provide regular training to industry managers and directors on industry 4.0.
profile_positions.title: Trainer @ Programa de Alta Dirección en Digital Business

profile_positions.description:
I held the commercial manager and strategic direction responsibilities. Our value proposition was based on centralized connectivity through multi-brand integration platforms that can be used throughout the entire care process, and which, through different modular and customizable data visualization and exploitation applications, optimize the care practice of all hospital services and interaction with the patient and their families.

DigitoMedica developed an IoMT platform to enable Multi brand Medical devices connectivity for home-hospital applications.

DigitoMedica was Integrated into Better Care in November 2022. The integration has allowed further boosting our developed solutions.
profile_positions.title: Cofunder/Director/ Business Development

profile_positions.description:
Solutions development and Business Developer in Healthcare for medical equipment, services and consulting. DextroMedica is the official Philips Healthcare distributor for Defibrillators, Electrocardiography, Monitors Systems, Obstetrics and IT solutions in Catalonia.

I am responsible for achieving our budget targets and coordinating the team of product developers.
profile_positions.title: Business Unit Manager / Market Developer at Dextro

profile_positions.description:
Support the development of training methodologies in two European projects dealing with the question of how to make Industry 4.0 technologies more accessible to European SMEs. 

Support the 5G team of the MWcapital in designing a pilot project that demonstrates the benefits of applying 5G technology to digitalize production environments. 

Discussing the digitalization challenges of SMEs and Tech providers with several companies to determine the best practices and approaches. 

The L4MS project is focused on developing an IoT platform for Material Handling Systems and a marketplace that enables its positioning in the SME manufacturing market. My role here has included understanding the IoT platform, determining its core value proposition and use the results to create a comprehensive training trajectory that moves potential customers from creating awareness up to learning how to configure the platform in a real industrial setting. 

The I4MS project is focused on supporting other European Innovation Actions in bringing their Industry 4.0 technologies closer to SMEs. My role here has been on understanding the needs for training of SMEs and learning about the offerings that Digital Innovation Hubs in Europe are bringing to the market. Both perspectives have come together into an online catalog of training on industry 4.0.
profile_positions.title: Digital Transformation Manager

profile_positions.description:
Manage our participation in new and existing H2020 EU funded projects:
- 3 are business accelerators
- 2 on Industry 4.0
- 1 on 5G

My role includes:
- Achieved adquisition of projects worth EUR 1.300K in 11 months
- Managing a team of 4.5 FTEs
- Managing a budget of around 600K per year. 
- Creating strategic partnerships with organizations across Europe to coordinate participation in new calls. 
- Serving as the liaison between the EU projects and the programs we run at the MWCapital
- Manage administrative aspects of the projects. 
- Create the strategic vision of the department and translate it into concrete targets and objectives.
profile_positions.title: Head European Projects Department

profile_positions.description:
Provide training and coaching on Lean Six Sigma methodologies to improve operational excellence of both manufacturing and engineering processes. Have supported the development of material on Design for Six Sigma. 

Currently working on setting up the Spanish branch of the company.
profile_positions.title: Lean Six Sigma Consultant

profile_positions.description:
Support the development of the platform. Organized masterclasses with industry experts in Industry 4.0. 

Responsible for getting customers and defining the marketing strategy. 

Designed an Industry 4.0 workshop for helping companies in configuring their digital transformations. As part of the workshop, I designed an Industry 4.0 configuration canvas, an auditing tool, an inspiration session and five domain-specific training on topics like CPS, I 4.0 based Operational Excellence, prosumers in the digital era, Smart Product Development and Flexible Factories. 

Provided workshops to Dutch industry following the developed approach.
profile_positions.title: Project Leader Industry 4.0/Business Development

profile_positions.description: Provide training on Lean Management. The training is provided through Symbol Spain, its an orange belt level and includes some elements of lean product development and use of digital technologies in lean implementations.
profile_positions.title: Trainer Lean Management

profile_positions.description:
•	Coach and advisor on lean projects in different value chain processes (e.g.: supply chain @ Unilever, engineering @ Philips & Tebodin, change management @ DAIMLER, product development @ Océ and Lely, manufacturing & VDL).

•	Project leader on industry 4.0 strategy development project @ APOLLO Tires. 

•	Dissemination Commissar in Robust Planet, FP7 European project on supply chain management. 

•	Yearly manage 3 PhD, 5 MSc and 4 BS projects together with 360 students distributed over 6 courses.

•	MSc teacher of Lean Product Development, Manufacturing Facility Design and Design of Production and Inventory Systems.

•	Co-writer of EU project proposals and other Dutch national grants. Acquired private funding for R&D.

•	Project leader of social incubation project of University of Twente.
profile_positions.title: Assistant Professor

profile_positions.description: Researched the automation of design process, which was developed in close cooperation with several industrial partners (Philips, VanDerLande and PAnalytical). The most concrete results were a: (1) a framework for quickly structuring design processes,  (2) a generic method for automating design and (3) three computer tools that automate the design of cooling channels for injection molding, the design of runner gate systems for injection molding, and the design of transmission systems.
profile_positions.title: Research/Teaching Assistant

volunteer_experiences.description:
The Faculty Club Foundation’s aim is to stimulate the academic discourse at the University of Twente and its environment in an innovative, stimulating way. In addition, it wishes to provide a platform for discussing social themes. The Foundation contributes to the development and shaping of an academic community for staff and students of the University but also for the public authorities, businesses and inhabitants of the region. The Foundation organises activities around current themes within the university, the region, or society at large. The Foundation also has a facilitating role in creating and maintaining networks, always with the Campus as central meeting place.

http://www.utwente.nl/facultyclub/en/
Studium General is the main cultural body of the University of Twente. It organizes seminars, debate
